goals.active: Infiltrate the krait tower and steal the orb.
goals.complete: Apatia and I allowed ourselves to be taken prisoner by krait slavers so we could get close to the orb. Everything went perfectly until I found and claimed the orb. The krait recaptured Apatia, but I couldn't stop to free her. The orb and I are both needed back at Fort Trinity. I swore to return and rescue Apatia.
